attributes.action: To Consider Military Intervention in Zimbabwe
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Having watched this weeks ITV News special - "A nation in meltdown"

Gordon Brown must consider a Military Intervention in Zimbabwe !!

Desmond Tutu The former Archbishop of Cape Town said "I look to him ( Gordon Brown ) for more effective intervention - especially humanitarian aid."

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
